Sentencas: Shape distortions during constrained sintering experiment of bi-layer porous and dense cerium gadolinium oxide (CGO) structures have been modeled.
Titulo: Modeling kinetics of distortion in porous bi-layered structures

Sentencas: Technologies like solid oxide fuel cells require co-firing thin layers with different green densities, which often exhibit differential shrinkage because of different sintering rates of the materials resulting in undesired distortions of the component.
Titulo: Modeling kinetics of distortion in porous bi-layered structures

Sentencas: An analytical model based on the continuum theory of sintering has been developed to describe the kinetics of densification and distortion in the sintering processes.
Titulo: Modeling kinetics of distortion in porous bi-layered structures

Sentencas: A new approach is used to extract the material parameters controlling shape distortion through optimizing the model to experimental data of free shrinkage strains.
Titulo: Modeling kinetics of distortion in porous bi-layered structures

Sentencas: The significant influence of weight of the sample (gravity) on the kinetics of distortion is taken in to consideration.
Titulo: Modeling kinetics of distortion in porous bi-layered structures

Sentencas: The modeling predictions indicate good agreement with the results of sintering of a bi-layered CGO system in terms of evolutions of bow, porosities and also layer thickness.
Titulo: Modeling kinetics of distortion in porous bi-layered structures
